item.title: Feed Created!
item.author: Alex Brown Sobinec
item.description: Our RSS feed is now out, also a new medium website update!
item.content:
Greetings! The official VITA4EVER RSS feed has been created.

To add it to your RSS reader, please use this link: https://vita4ever.github.io/Feed.xml

You can also use a built in RSS reader on our website, just visit this page.

We also added a status page, where you can see the current status of development. To visit it, open this page.

That is the end of this post. Please await for future news and updates.

And as usual...

With VITA4EVER, Revive the past - Together.
